1�This looks like an Orcish dwelling. The door is firmly shut.
4�You open the door.
1�Th-thank you!
1�But, I wonder what that Orc meant...
1�Could it be true...that a new leader has united the hordes?
1�Do the beastmen really wish to war with us again?
1�I will return to the chateau with these two. Be careful, friend.
s.�You are unable to log anythin
s!�You successfully cut off  $???
1�Your #???? break
?!�You cut off  $????, but your #???? breaks in the proces
g.�You cannot carry any more items. Your inventory is ful
l.�Wait!
1�You are the adventurer that Pieuje sent, are you not?
1�On behalf of my spineless brother, I thank you.
1�Well, enough blather. Let us save the boy. Open the door!
1�Is anyone here?
1�Why, Your Highness!
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Save the Children(pt.1).Save the Children(pt.2).Save the Children(pt.3-A).Save the Children(pt.3-B).The Holy Crest(pt.1).The Holy Crest(pt.2).Mirror, Mirror(pt.1).Mirror, Mirror(pt.2).Mirror, Mirror(pt.3).Face of the Future.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
!!�<Huff, puff>...
1�What in the world...<gasp>...do you mean?How can there have been...<pant>...any indecision in that!?
1�Huh? Why foul your mouth with something bitter?That makes not a whit of sense...
1�<Puff, pant> All right...who's next...?
1�Wait! You mentioned seeing an Elvaan child being held captive...
1�Tell me what he looked like!
1� , the fault is mine that he's been taken! We must rescue him!
!!�Huh? Not an Orc?
1�No. 'Twas no better than your last effort.
1�You mask it with blind aggression, but these eyes will not be tricked.Like the fool who tries to swim clad in armor, your movements are encumbered by indecision still.
1�Listen to me, boy. No man can undo his past.

1�Every man gladly clings on to his joys and successes. But as a ship raises anchor that it might sail towards the horizon, so too must a man bear the weight of his failures if he would move forward.
1�I shall share with you a pearl of wisdom.
1�??He who would toast with victory's sweetest nectar must first partake of defeat's bitterest victuals.??
1�These are the words of my erstwhile teacher.
1�<Sigh>... In time, you will come to understand.For now, stay focused on the enemy!
1�Hm? You're the adventurer from before...
1�Forgive me my introspection, but your resemblance to an acquaintance of decades past evokes within me memories of bygone days.
1�I know that voice...
1�Be strong, man!
1�So, the dauntless agent who had infiltrated the den of Orcs was you all along!Altana's breath, 'tis good to see you alive...if somewhat the worse for wear.
1�I've not given you leave, boy! Your training isn't complete!
1�Curses! He stands not a chance on his own.Lharant, take word to Bostillette. We shall precede the main force in infiltrating the enemy's lair.
1�There's no helping it. Insolent as he may be, we cannot stand idly by while the boy rushes headlong into grave peril.Now go, Lharant!
1�Int...Intelligence Operative...<gasp>...Lharant...<wheeze>...reporting, sir...
1�No need for concern, sir. The internal injuries sustained from that fell blow are already--<cough, hack>--on the mend.
1�More importantly, I come bearing intelligence on the latest Orcish activities.As breathing triggers some discomfort still, I'd be most obliged if you could lean closer...
1�...And that concludes my report.
1�Regrettably, the dimness revealed little to me of the lad's appearance.I did, however, take note of the sword which lay at his side.
1�'Twas a finely forged blade of fiery red steel, doubtless worth good coin. I suspect the lad is highborn.
1�A friend of yours, I gather? Would that I could've extracted the lad, but the Orcs standing sentry made the task quite impossible.
1�S-surely you jest!? You're but a few, and the statues are powerful and many!
1�Very well, sir. Before I leave, I would give you this 3????.It should allow you to escape the enemy's notice when you steal into the caverns.
1�'Tis designed for single use, but spares can be obtained from the covert communications chest should the need arise.
1�Please take all care, sir. I shall fly like the wind back to base camp.
!!�Uwaaaaaah! Stop! H-hold your morbols--I mean, chocobos!
1�Th-that was uncalled for...
1�(Th-this is...)
1�(Magnificent! Magnificent beyond words! So, this is the fruit of twenty years of labor!)
1�(Egads, Mekglok! How you've aged! Though two decades would do this to any Orc, to be sure.)
1�(Well pleased am I with your dedication. Entrusting the blueprints to you was a decision most wise.)
1�(Gahaha! Dependable as ever, I see! Now, tell me. Is it operational?)
1�(D-do my eyes play at mischief? Dare I hope that before me stands a mighty legion, ready to carry out my bidding?)
1�(B-beyond my wildest dreams! With these miracles of science at my disposal, history shall be at my mercy!)
1�Gahahaha...
1�Gwahahahahaha!!!
1�(What? An Elvaan child on the loose, causing mayhem in Ghelsba, you say?)
1�(Excenmille, I'll wager...)
1�(Mekglok, ready the statues for immediate deployment.)
1�(No. Not only those.)
1�(I would see the crowning glory of my legion christened in battle.)
1�(The enemy is but one scrawny Elvaan boy...plus what other vermin crawls out of the woodwork.)
1�(This shall serve perfectly as the final test run before I send forth my legion to conquer the past!)
1�(Enough! You will do as I say!)
1�(Gahaha... The moment of our showdown is come, Excenmille.)
1�(By the honor of my fallen clan, I swear I shall have satisfaction of you this day!)
1�(Aaah, Master Zogbog! No see you long time!)
1�(Twenty year pass already? Me very enjoy work, so no feel like twenty year!)
1�(Right now me inject magic, Master Zogbog. It be ready soon.)
1�(Ah! Me want to show Master Zogbog something else. This way please come.)
1�(You like, Master Zogbog? Me already finish inject magic, so they ready to move.)
1�(If you mean small one, they already ready, Master Zogbog.)
1�(Huh? M-Master Zogbog, me not finish inject magic into big one. And many trial to run--)
1�(B-but Master Zogbog...)
1�(Y-yes, Master Zogbog.)
